## Status Quo

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
remotes::install_github("haleyjeppson/ggmosaic")

library(ggmosaic)

titanic |>
  ggplot() + 
  geom_mosaic(aes(x = product(Sex)))
 
titanic |>
  ggplot() + 
  geom_mosaic(aes(fill = Survived, x = product("all")))

titanic |>
  ggplot() + 
  geom_mosaic(aes(fill = Survived, x = product(Sex)))
```

```{r}
titanic |>
  ggplot() + 
  geom_mosaic(aes(fill = Survived, x = product(Sex)))

last_plot() + 
  geom_mosaic(aes(fill = Survived, 
                  x = product("all")), 
              alpha = .5)
```
